title: The Giants
creator_credit: Kratky Film, Zdenka Deitchova and Gene Deitch
brief_description: A satirical cartoon film which exposes and ridicules in allegorical form, human intolerance, malice, cowardice and irresponsibility. Intended as a protest against violence and despotism.
